name: Literacy and numeracy
description: As part of Generic Programmes and Qualifications, Literacy and numeracy programmes are primarily designed for adults to acquire or improve fundamental skills in reading, writing, and arithmetic. [cite: 39, 40]

name: Basic remedial programmes for youth or adults
description: These are Literacy and numeracy programmes aimed at providing remedial education in fundamental reading, writing, and arithmetic skills for youth or adults. [cite: 39, 41]

name: Literacy
description: This focuses on the skill of reading and writing, taught as part of Literacy and numeracy programmes, predominantly for adults. [cite: 39, 40, 41]

name: Numeracy
description: This focuses on fundamental arithmetic skills, taught as part of Literacy and numeracy programmes, predominantly for adults. [cite: 39, 40, 41]
